EmailTemplate.description: Sent to customers with resolved SMS issues - will close the case after 5 business days
EmailTemplate.name: Resolved SMS Issue
EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Alert: Resolved SMS Status Update - Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I’m very happy to inform you that the issue with your SunPower Monitoring System has been resolved. We have verified that your SunPower Solar System is now consistently reporting energy production information to our database. Please feel free to reply to this email if you still need help and would like to keep the case open due to an ongoing issue. I will close the case after five (5) business days if I don’t receive a response from you.
If you want to get in touch with us faster, try the “How can we help?” button at us.sunpower.com. Alternatively you can call us at 1-800-786-7693, option 4 for Technical Support. We’re here for you Monday through Friday from 7 a.m. until 7 p.m. PST.
We would love to hear from you. Your feedback helps us understand what you value most about our service and how we can serve you better. Please take a short survey about our customer service and your SunPower experience. You should receive a separate email with a link upon case closure.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName} | Customer Service Representative Global Business and Finance Services | office 1-800-786-7693 (SUNPOWER) |
